blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: How the fuck do i help Steve?! How! Tell Me HOW!
title: How the fuck do i help Steve?! How! Tell Me HOW!
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WhWyWy

by RavenWolf48

“Maybe we can get it earlier in the day?” Steve suggested.

“How is that going to help?”

“I don’t know!”

“How would we even get there?”

“I don’t know!”

“Well make another stupid ass suggestion and we -”

“This might have never happened if you hadn’t helped me in the first place -!”

“How the hell was I supposed to help Steve?” Tony blew up. “You already fucked everything up - so tell me how the fuck I was supposed to fix your goddamn mess!” Tony’s voice rose and he stopped, panting slightly.

Steve was looking at him, lips slightly parted. Tony realized the deeper meaning to his words and looked away.

—————————–

In which Steve and Tony screw with the timeline in more ways than one

Words: 1334, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Thor, Loki, Scott Lang
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark (Implied)
  • Additional Tags: Endgame Fix-It, Crack Fic, Crack Treated Seriously, ptsd tony, Time Travel, endgame spoilers


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WhWyWy

Jules. France. Slytherin. Introvert living in fictional worlds."Don't do anything stupid till I get back.""How could I ? You're taking all the stupid with you."🔱
Masterlist

summary: Hi! I've seen a couple of your ship fics recently and if they're still open I'd love one :) <3 I'm a straight female who's 5'8",...
question: Hi! I've seen a couple of your ship fics recently and if they're still open I'd love one :) <3 I'm a straight female who's 5'8", I have medium length brown hair, blue eyes, I occasionally wear glasses for long distance things and I'm an INFJ. I'm kind of a shy person but once I get to know someone my true self comes out.  and I love a good joke. I really enjoy photography and want to go into a creative career like directing. I also care a bit too much everyone and just want them to be happy. <3
answer:
A/N : I ship you with our iconic Tony Stark ! This is a little bit different, I really hope you like it ! Enjoy :) 

Title : 3000 

“Babe, I know it’s weird but I have to ask. Is it illegal to kill a robot just because it pisses me off ? I mean, technically I made it, so doesn’t it give me the right to … ” Tony stopped when he walked into the bedroom and found you laying on the bed, a worried frown crossing your face.

“Tony, I don’t have time for your stupid questions right now, I’m trying to find inspiration.” You sat down on the bed, staring at your camera on the desk.

“Oh good ! Inspiration is my middle name.”

You chuckled. Your smartass boyfriend was really the only one capable of making you laugh when you were that stressed.

“I am looking for inspiration for the photography contest. It’s tomorrow, and I don’t have anything…” You sighed. 

“Say no more. Where do you want me to stand ? Do you want me to put on the suit ? No, obviously, a good photo must show my handsome face and body. Wait, let me just take off my shirt before we do the photoshoot, I’ll just–”

“Stop talking!!” You threw a pillow at him. You couldn’t help but burst out laughing. 

“Seriously babe.” Tony sat on the bed beside you. “You’re the most talented person I know. You don’t have to find inspiration, inspiration is going to find you.” He softly said, brushing the hair away from your face.

That was what you loved the most about him. He always had your back, no matter what. Truth was Tony had admired you since day one. He always was the scientist one, the logical one, the stubborn one. You were the artist. The girl who showed him the beauty of the world. The girl who proved him there was something more. He wasn’t used to it, but he loved it. He loved you.

Actually, thinking about your relationship gave you an idea.

“Looks like inspiration did find me.” You said as you entered Tony’s workshop later that day. “Here.” You put a photograph you just had developed on the table where he was working.

It was a photo of your house. Under the porch were the Iron Man mask with one of your cameras placed just in front of it, as if the mask was taking a picture.

“This is supposed to represent us, who we are.” You explained. “Different, but always united in a way, and always there for each other…” 

“Hmm” Tony looked intently at the photograph, a smile stretching his lips. “Still would have been better with me in it, but I totally get symbolism.”

“Shut up!” You laughed as he kissed your forehead.

That night, Tony framed the photograph and hanged it above your bed. And guess what ? You won the photography contest.

reblog.comment:
A/N : I ship you with our iconic Tony Stark ! This is a little bit different, I really hope you like it ! Enjoy :)

A/N : I ship you with our iconic Tony Stark ! This is a little bit different, I really hope you like it ! Enjoy :) 

Title : 3000 

“Babe, I know it’s weird but I have to ask. Is it illegal to kill a robot just because it pisses me off ? I mean, technically I made it, so doesn’t it give me the right to … ” Tony stopped when he walked into the bedroom and found you laying on the bed, a worried frown crossing your face.

“Tony, I don’t have time for your stupid questions right now, I’m trying to find inspiration.” You sat down on the bed, staring at your camera on the desk.

“Oh good ! Inspiration is my middle name.”

You chuckled. Your smartass boyfriend was really the only one capable of making you laugh when you were that stressed.

“I am looking for inspiration for the photography contest. It’s tomorrow, and I don’t have anything…” You sighed. 

“Say no more. Where do you want me to stand ? Do you want me to put on the suit ? No, obviously, a good photo must show my handsome face and body. Wait, let me just take off my shirt before we do the photoshoot, I’ll just–”

“Stop talking!!” You threw a pillow at him. You couldn’t help but burst out laughing. 

“Seriously babe.” Tony sat on the bed beside you. “You’re the most talented person I know. You don’t have to find inspiration, inspiration is going to find you.” He softly said, brushing the hair away from your face.

That was what you loved the most about him. He always had your back, no matter what. Truth was Tony had admired you since day one. He always was the scientist one, the logical one, the stubborn one. You were the artist. The girl who showed him the beauty of the world. The girl who proved him there was something more. He wasn’t used to it, but he loved it. He loved you.

Actually, thinking about your relationship gave you an idea.

“Looks like inspiration did find me.” You said as you entered Tony’s workshop later that day. “Here.” You put a photograph you just had developed on the table where he was working.

It was a photo of your house. Under the porch were the Iron Man mask with one of your cameras placed just in front of it, as if the mask was taking a picture.

“This is supposed to represent us, who we are.” You explained. “Different, but always united in a way, and always there for each other…” 

“Hmm” Tony looked intently at the photograph, a smile stretching his lips. “Still would have been better with me in it, but I totally get symbolism.”

“Shut up!” You laughed as he kissed your forehead.

That night, Tony framed the photograph and hanged it above your bed. And guess what ? You won the photography contest.

blog.name: sunsetspidey
blog.title: we won, mr. stark
blog.description: veronica. 22. everybody wants a happy ending, right? but it doesn't always roll that way  | masterlist

tags: and then i cry and want to die
summary: sometimes, i forget that tony stark is dead. then i realize that he sacrificed him to save the entire universe, but that he no...
body:
sometimes, i forget that tony stark is dead.

then i realize that he sacrificed him to save the entire universe, but that he no longer exists. he’s no longer living happily in the lake house with pepper and morgan. he’s no longer able to mentor peter parker. he’s no longer spitting out sarcastic comments at his fellow avengers. he’s unable to gift the world with more great inventions. 

there is no more tony stark - no more iron man. and it hurts

blog.name: muggle-struggles101
blog.title: Welcome
blog.description: I love Marvel, Chris Evans, Disney etc. I also love to like/reblog random shit ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°).

summary: I think I figured out why Endgame hurt me in such a deep way
body:
I think I figured out why Endgame hurt me in such a deep way

My parents liked movies, especially action movies and ever since I was young they’ve shown me lots of different ones. I was around 7 when the first Iron Man was released, I thought it was so cool. I loved that movie as a lot of others did. And as years passed and the other MCU movies were released I fell more and more in love with this wonderfully amazing world. I think I was around 12 or 13 when I started to get depressed. I didn’t know it back then but sometimes I would feel really down for no reason. When I felt like that I usually asked if we could watch a marvel movie. If I was lucky they would let me and we would sit down and watch them together, me, my mom, my stepdad and my little sister. Those are the times I was most happy, watching my favorite movies with my family. During those hours I would forget my earlier sadness. My depression got worse in 7th grade, it even went as far as self harming. Even during that time I still loved Marvel unconditionally. I would do as I always do, ask if we could watch one. I would get upset when my parents said that they weren’t in the mood for Marvel. But I didn’t wanna make a big deal so I just let it be. I didn’t want them to know I was sad. So I just started to watch those movies by myself when no one wanted to watch them with me. It was also because of Marvel that I met my best friend. I’m pretty sure I was drawing Tony Stark/Iron Man when she mentioned she likes Marvel too. She is now my closest friend and I don’t know what I’d do without her. About 2 or 3 years ago I lost my grandfather. He was sick for a long time and then one morning at about 5 am my grandma called us to deliver the terrible news. That day my mom and I were in shock, so much so that we barely reacted. We were like robots programmed to just go on with our days as usual. The day after however we broke down. I’m still struggling with it til this day but it always got a little bit better with the help of my favorite superheroes. Every ups and downs in my life I always had Marvel. If something good happened I would celebrate with Marvel, if something bad happened Marvel was my comfort. Endgame was so hard for me because it really was the end. It was the end of my childhood. Which is ironic since I am turning 18 this year. When I watched it a big part of me died. I had lost my sanctuary. I feel like people are annoyed when I’m sad because of it but I’m not mad. They just don’t understand what we go through. When I say Marvel was the comfort that got me through life I’m more than sure that many of you feel the same. To The Avengers; thank you for everything. I know this is cheesy but we love you 3000.

blog.name: foxdenrp
blog.title: RP Blog of Kel
blog.description:
Hello, I am Kel the Fox. Welcome to my den.
Here you will find many different muses from OCs, a world of demons, and some characters from fandoms. I hope you enjoy your stay and come back to visit.
This is a side blog to my personal one, foxwhohowlsatmoon If that blog follows you, it is me.

summary: Is there a muse - aside Kin - that you consistently have the muse for?
question: Is there a muse - aside Kin - that you consistently have the muse for?
answer:
This motherfucker right here.

Red Maxwell. He’s one of my oldest muses (older than Kin, before my time on Tumblr.)

He’s also one of my most transformed. He’s gone through a lot of development since he first was made and I am so proud of my son!

He is a very talkative muse and he will pop up at the most random moments. I never really have to work hard to get muse for him. He just hits the ground running and takes things head on.

A good runner up to him would be this man

Tony Stark. He’s my favorite Marvel character and I could talk all day about him. Like Red he’s very talkative. Always popping up at random times.
